          <title>
            <string language="sl">Delovanje računalnika, informacija</string>
            <string language="en">Working of computer, information</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Funktion des Computers, Informationen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fonctionnement d'ordinateur, l'information</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Funcionamento do computador, informação</string>

          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Navodila za predstavitev računalnika učencem in pojem informacije.</string>
            <string language="en">How to present computer to the learners and getting familiar with term - information.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="sl">delovanje</string>

          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie man Computer den Anfängern und dem Erhalten 
vertraut mit Bezeichnung - Informationen darstellt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment présenter l'ordinateur aux étudiants et 
à obtenir au courant de la limite - l'information.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como apresentar o computador aos learners e a 
começar familiar com o termo - informação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come presentare calcolatore ai principianti e ad 
ottenere esperto con il termine - le informazioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς να παρουσιάσει τον υπολογιστή στους αρχαρίους και 
την εξοικείωση με τον όρο - πληροφορίες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cómo presentar el ordenador a los principiantes y
a conseguir familiar con el término - información.</string>
